item.title: Understanding your soil, Part 1: Seed Compost
item.description: One thing I realized recently while learning how to container garden is that I could have a better understanding of soil and the different types available. Sure, I can go to a garden center and blindly pick soil based on the pictures on the bags, but I want to be an active thinker when it comes to the garden and understand the why behind it. Letâ€™s start from the beginning, with seeds.
